t: Healthier Thickening by Parapharma Tech - Makers of Gelmix Infant Thickener + Purathick
s: Gelmix, a hypoallergenic, USDA organic thickener for breast milk and infant formula, consists of an off-white fine powder that is tasteless, odorless and smooth when dissolved. It is the first USDA organic thickener specifically formulated for pediatric use in America.

Gelmix adds fiber to the diet, so for most babies, this may cause loose stools and gassiness at the start. Any changes to the diet can effect stools and is dependent on many factors, including how much fluid they are taking.
